page.title: 14LEGEND OF THE WIZARD
page.content: A farmer from Mobberley was taking his horse to sell at Macclesfield. When he got to the top of the Edge a strange man offered to buy the horse but the farmer refused. The stranger said "No-one will buy your horse" At the Macclesfield market no one did want to buy the horse and on the farmers way home the Wizard appeared again and said "Come with me" He led the farmer to some rocks. He struck them with his staff. The rocks opened to show a cave with some iron gates at the entrance. Down in the cave were some men asleep with white horses at their sides. There was one horse missing. The wizard said "Whenever the country needs their help they will awake and ride to battle to save their country". The wizard disappeard as the rocks closed.
